data.title: SFoF: Friends-of-friends galaxy cluster detection algorithm
data.name: sfof
data.description: SFoF is a friends-of-friends galaxy cluster detection algorithm that operates in either spectroscopic or photometric redshift space. The linking parameters, both transverse and along the line-of-sight, change as a function of redshift to account for selection effects.  The code is written in C++ and implements OMP to loop through the photometric redshift bins.
